channel.title: Didnt not recieve a 1099 (Tax Question)
channel.description:
I worked for a trucking company and i drove their truck, they paid me percentage. I earned $6800 and have not recieved my 1099 from them, my question is can i file my taxes without the 1099?
And if so, How?
I've tried google and couldn't find anything, and i've tried turbotax.
Help please, thanks.

item.title: Didnt not recieve a 1099 (Tax Question)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

request one from the IRS they are pretty good about giving you copies fax machine makes it relatively painless. IRS.gov

Read full topic
